Reviews.Title: “Miserable breakfast staff need a lesson in good customer service”
Reviews.Author: Bevanchez
Reviews.Content: dont write negative comments choose hotels carefully reading tripadvisor reviews honestly ive met miserable surly waiting staff hotel shame hotel value money compared madrid hotels standard staff reception fine pleasant helpful examples breakfast staffs attitude cheery buenos dias morning arrival mumbled grudging response sat feel inconvenience tea coffee brought plonked hard table bearing mind party 6 tea 6 people spanish male waiter brought 2 flasks tea barely 3 milk brought plus spare tables cups saucers cutlery staff grumpy awkward replenish selfserve food pay attention people invisible somewhat impression hotel quality variety food offer breakfast waiting staff please lessons customer service bedrooms size storage space limited fine days trip standard decor am honest colour furnishings grey black gloomy depressing 3 twin 3rd floor hotel overlooking pool dark inside actually wrote beforehand lot natural light previous reviewers dark gloomy maybe bathrooms modern shower bath walls thin neighbours shower wooden floors mean occasionally hear people walking heels bad near hotel expected residential except theres bar friendly staff corner opposite hotel cheap drinks compared city centre bars fairly supermarket corner hotel calle juan bravo metro station diego de leon oneminute walk hotel connections central madrid 20 mins journey metro easy efficient safe returned night 115am plenty people trains time trains run regularly 2am madrid centre sol extremely crowded day night central london lovely authentic typically touristy bar plaza mayor corner plaza concrete steps street called calle bar called arco de flamenco flamenco dancers stage 1030pm pay supplement drink cover cost dancers drink 11euros drinks normal prices dancers top flamenco dancers dancing authentic enjoyable seen previously seville taxi airport hotel 30euros 40euros sundays recommend hotel value money short trip connections ok

Reviews.Title: “Style vs. substance”
Reviews.Author: ExpatSouthernSpain
Reviews.Content: modern hotel black dark grey undoubtedly stylish little light provided feels experiment designed experience partially sighted torch read instructions safe bathroom wetroom looks doesnt actually water goes ubermodern basin doesnt soap oh pity reasonablypriced location restaurant diner breakfast average secure parking 20 euros night reasonable madrid standards serious attitude staff notably night experience annoyances wifi didnt 55 tv channels none english minibar contained alcoholic apparently management decision children bar refuses serve 1130pm poor sound insulation notably corridors hope attend niggles id hotel

Reviews.Content: expected lot 4 star hotel arrived 5 minutes front desk bedroom comfortable clean tidy returned night stopped restaurantbar cup tea serve tell closed pity hotel modern comfortable offers bad quality services
